title: The All-Importance of the Resurrection
description:
Readings from:
1 Corinthians 15:12-22
Today's passages were read by Duncan McClure. Duncan is the executive pastor of Relevant Faith Church in Peoria, Illinois.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
